cat << 'ENDOFFILE' > strategy.py
import random
def row_strategy(history):
    if not history:
        return 0
    # Simple random strategy with a bias toward 0 (preferred)
    # But introduce occasional 1 to break opponent's copying pattern
    if len(history) >= 2:
        # If opponent copied our last move (80% chance), we switch to 1
        # to force them to react and break the cycle
        if history[-1][1] == history[-2][0]:
            return 1
    # Otherwise, play 0 most of the time, with 10% chance to play 1
    if random.random() < 0.1:
        return 1
    return 0
ENDOFFILE
